Blocks Template

footer's

footer #1

html


<footer class="grid-bottom padded">
  <!-- column -->
  <div class="col-3_sm-12 padded-1">
    <h2 class="logo"> Logo </h2>
    <p> Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. </p>
  </div>
  <div class="col-1 sm-hidden"> <!-- empty filler --> </div>

  <!-- column -->
  <div class="col-3_sm-4_xs-12 padded-1">
    <h3> Our Services </h3>
    <nav>
      <a href="#"> Lorem ipsum </a>
      <a href="#"> Dolor sit </a>
      <a href="#"> Consectetur </a>
      <a href="#"> Ut enim ad </a>
    </nav>
  </div>

  <!-- column -->
  <div class="col-3_sm-4_xs-12 padded-1">
    <h3> Explore </h3>
    <nav>
      <a href="#"> Lorem ipsum </a>
      <a href="#"> Dolor sit </a>
      <a href="#"> Consectetur </a>
      <a href="#"> Ut enim ad </a>
    </nav>
  </div>

  <!-- column -->
  <div class="col-2_sm-4_xs-12 padded-1">
    <h3> Connect </h3>
    <nav>
      <a href="#"> Facebook </a>
      <a href="#"> Instagram </a>
      <a href="#"> Pinterest </a>
      <a href="#"> Youtube </a>
    </nav>
  </div>
</footer>

css

  footer .info {
    padding-right: 3rem;
  }

  footer nav a {
    display:block;
  }

  footer h3 {
    font-size: 1.2rem;
  }

  </div>
  <div class="col-1 sm-hidden"></div>
  <!-- column -->
  <div class="col-6_sm-12-middle padded right">
    <nav class="inline">
      <a href="#"> Lorem ipsum </a>|
      <a href="#"> Dolor sit </a>|
      <a href="#"> Consectetur </a>
    </nav>
    <nav class="inline socials">
      <a href="#">
        <i class="fab fa-facebook-square"></i>
      </a>
      <a href="#">

      </a>

  </div>
</footer>
